title: Can i get my side switched in the new event?
body: I started a game with the chaos icon by accident, I wanted to do the order one. Can i get my side switched?

replies.body: After you complete the initial mission you should receive both icons. Once you finish the mission for the day, you won't be able to do the other sides mission. However, if you want to switch to Order you can equip that icon and start the Order missions on the next day.
